(Name of Issuer) Class A ordinary shares, par value $ 0.000006666666667 per share (Title of Class&nbsp;of Securities) G6683N 103** (CUSIP Number) December&nbsp;31, 2021 (Date of Event Which Requires Filing of this Statement) &nbsp; &nbsp; Check the appropriate box to designate the rule pursuant to which this schedule is filed: &#9744; Rule 13d-1(b) &#9744; Rule 13d-1(c) &#9746; Rule 13d-1(d) &nbsp; * The remainder of this cover page shall be filled out for a reporting person&#146;s initial filing on this form with respect to the subject class of securities, and for any subsequent amendment containing information which would alter the disclosures provided in a prior cover page. ** This CUSIP number applies to the Issuer&#146;s Class&nbsp;A Ordinary Stock. The information required in the remainder of this cover page shall not be deemed to be &#147;filed&#148; for the purpose of Section&nbsp;18 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (&#147;Act&#148;) or otherwise subject to the liabilities of that section of the Act but shall be subject to all other provisions of the Act (however, see the Notes). &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;1&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;NAME OF REPORTING PERSON &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. GROWTH FUND VI, L.P. (&#147;SC US (TTGP)&#148;) &nbsp;&nbsp;2 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;CHECK THE APPROPRIATE BOX IF A MEMBER OF A GROUP &nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9744;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9744; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;3 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;SEC USE ONLY &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;4 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;CITIZENSHIP OR PLACE OF ORGANIZATION &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;CAYMAN ISLANDS NUMBER&nbsp;OF SHARES &nbsp;BENEFICIALLY&nbsp; OWNED&nbsp;BY EACH REPORTING PERSON WITH &nbsp;&nbsp; 5&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;SOLE VOTING POWER &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;0 &nbsp;&nbsp; 6 &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;SHARED VOTING POWER &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;555,446,088 shares, of which 132,089,442 shares are directly owned by SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. GROWTH FUND VI, 7,971,750 shares are directly owned by SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. GROWTH PRINCIPALS VI FUND, 318,994,596 shares are directly owned by SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. VENTURE FUND XIV, 15,939,900 shares are directly owned by SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. PARTNERS FUND XIV and 80,450,400 shares are directly owned by SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. VENTURE PARTNERS FUND XV (Q). ITEM 1. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a) Name of Issuer: Nu Holdings, Ltd. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b) Address of Issuer&#146;s Principal Executive Offices: Campbells Corporate Services Limited, Floor 4, Willow House, Cricket Square, KY1-9010 Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands ITEM 2. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a) Name of Persons Filing: Sequoia Capital U.S. Growth Fund VI, L.P. Sequoia Capital U.S. Growth Principals VI Fund, L.P. Sequoia Capital U.S. Venture Fund XIV, L.P. Sequoia Capital U.S. Venture Partners Fund XIV, L.P. Sequoia Capital U.S. Venture Partners Fund XIV (Q), L.P. SC U.S. Growth VI Management, L.P. SC U.S. Venture XIV Management, L.P. SC US (TTGP), Ltd. The General Partner of SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. GROWTH FUND VI and SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. GROWTH PRINCIPALS VI FUND is SC U.S. GROWTH VI MANAGEMENT. The General Partner of SC U.S. GROWTH VI MANAGEMENT is SC US (TTGP). The General Partner of SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. VENTURE FUND XIV, SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. PARTNERS FUND XIV and SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. VENTURE PARTNERS FUND XIV (Q)&nbsp;is SC U.S. VENTURE XIV MANAGEMENT. The General Partner of SC U.S. VENTURE XIV MANAGEMENT is SC US (TTGP). &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b) Address of Principal Business Office or, if none, Residence: 2800 Sand Hill Road, Suite 101 Menlo Park, CA 94025 &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c) Citizenship: SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. GROWTH FUND VI, SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. GROWTH PRINCIPALS VI FUND, SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. VENTURE FUND XIV, SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. PARTNERS FUND XIV, SEQUOIA CAPITAL U.S. VENTURE PARTNERS FUND XIV (Q), SC U.S. GROWTH VI MANAGEMENT, SC U.S. VENTURE XV MANAGEMENT, SC US (TTGP): Cayman Islands &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d) CUSIP No.: G6683N 103 ITEM 3. OWNERSHIP SEE ROWS 5 THROUGH 11 OF COVER PAGES &nbsp; ITEM&nbsp;5. OWNERSHIP OF FIVE PERCENT OR LESS OF A CLASS If this statement is being filed to report the fact that as of the date hereof the reporting person has ceased to be the beneficial owner of more than five percent of the class of securities, check the following&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9744;. &nbsp; ITEM&nbsp;6. OWNERSHIP OF MORE THAN FIVE PERCENT ON BEHALF OF ANOTHER PERSON NOT APPLICABLE &nbsp; ITEM&nbsp;7. IDENTIFICATION AND CLASSIFICATION OF THE SUBSIDIARY WHICH ACQUIRED THE SECURITY BEING REPORTED ON BY THE PARENT HOLDING COMPANY. NOT APPLICABLE &nbsp; ITEM&nbsp;8. CERTIFICATION NOT APPLICABLE SIGNATURES After reasonable inquiry and to the best of my knowledge and belief, the undersigned certifies that the information set forth in this statement is true, complete and correct.
